unnormalised: My nani got her Covid vaccine on 15/03/2021 at the local PHC, and thankfully, she didn't have any major side effects, just a slight fever for a day. Dr. Sharma said it's important for everyone, especially the elderly, to get vaccinated to protect against severe illness.
normalised: My nani got her Covid vaccine on fifteenth March two thousand and twenty one at the local P-H-C, and thankfully, she didn't have any major side effects, just a slight fever for a day. Doctor Sharma said it's important for everyone, especially the elderly, to get vaccinated to protect against severe illness.
